channel.title: Alpine on LoopedNetwork
channel.description: Recent content in Alpine on LoopedNetwork

item.title: Compiling GSS-NTLMSSP For Alpine Linux
item.description: I recently found myself working on a project which required the GSS-NTLMSSP library. The application is going to be delivered via Kubernetes, so I needed to build a Docker image with this library. The project’s build instructions are pretty clear about what the dependencies are, but given that this was going to be a Docker image, I wanted to use Alpine Linux as the base image in order to keep the image size as small as possible.
